title: Central Question
questions: What is the impact of quality issues and inefficiencies on the project's schedule and labor consumption?

title: Scope Evolution
questions: How much scope was added due to rework or coordination issues?
approach: Compare 66 YATES schedule snapshots to track task growth. Cross-reference with weekly reports to categorize additions (rework, coordination issues, design changes). Reconcile against change orders when available.

title: Delay Attribution
questions: How much schedule impact resulted from quality and performance issues?
approach: Track completion date movement across snapshots. Correlate with 1,108 documented issues from weekly reports. Identify which activities and trades were involved when delays occurred.

title: Resource Consumption
questions: How much labor was consumed and what factors drove consumption?
approach: Track labor hours by contractor, trade, and date. Correlate labor consumption with documented issues and rework tasks. Quantify labor during problem periods.

title: Quality Impact
questions: What quality issues occurred and what rework did they drive?
approach: Compile NCR and inspection reports by trade and location. Link quality issues to rework tasks in schedule. Quantify rework duration and labor consumed. Supplement with MXI field documentation.
